name: Rooty the Racoon
description:
Our poor, kind, and lonely Rooty found himself alone, desperate, running to the forest's darkest spot. Help him rebuild his roots in the forest and remember the good moments he had with his family. Collect berries to maintain your food, drink water, and collect materials to construct your first home. Be aware that some wolves may show up at night to grab a bite! 

Created as part of the Global Game Jam 2023.

Made in 48 hours!

Theme: Roots

Key binds

  • WASD - Move 
  • SHIFT - Sprint 
  • SPACE - Jump 
  • P/ESC - Pause 
  • Mouse - Rotate Camera
  • Q - Eat Berries
  • E - Interact
